briefTitle: Sexual Dysfunction Check-up in Premenopausal Breast Cancer Survivors Taking Endocrine Therapy: A Cross-Sectional Study
officialTitle: SEXCHECK - Sexual Dysfunction Check-up in Premenopausal Breast Cancer Survivors Taking Endocrine Therapy: A Cross-Sectional Study
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Sexual Dysfunction, Premenopausal Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women aged ≥18 and ≤ 55
* who underwent surgery for early stage breast cancer
* taking endocrine therapy for at least 3 months
* providing an informed consent and completing the study questionnaires.

Exclusion Criteria:

* withdrawal of the informed consent, at any time
